properties.name: checked
properties.description: The checked state of an item in a list.

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: The expansion state of an item of type

properties.name: index
properties.description: The 0-based index of this item in the

properties.name: selected
properties.description: The selection state of this item.

properties.name: image
properties.description: An image object for an icon to display in the item.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The label text to display for the item, a localizable string.

properties.name: subItems
properties.description: When the parent is a multi-column

properties.name: properties
properties.description: An object that contains one or more creation properties of the item (properties used only when the element is created).

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent element, a list control.

name: ListItem
description: An item in a list box, drop-down list, or tree view.
